# Selfdotsend
> Selfdotsend is a computing blog by Pankaj Doharey focused on programming languages, data structures, systems programming, Unix tooling, and applied AI.

## Site
- [Home](https://www.selfdotsend.com/)
- [Blog](https://www.selfdotsend.com/blog/)
- [Archive](https://www.selfdotsend.com/archive/)
- [About](https://www.selfdotsend.com/about/)
- [Tags](https://www.selfdotsend.com/tags/)
- [Nano Chat](https://www.selfdotsend.com/nano-chat/)

## Feeds
- [RSS](https://www.selfdotsend.com/rss.xml)

## Selected Technical Posts
- [Git status on Unix terminal](https://www.selfdotsend.com/blog/2018/07/19/git-status-on-unix-terminal/)
- [Learn to write an editor](https://www.selfdotsend.com/blog/2018/08/06/learn-to-write-an-editor/)
- [Writing a Programmers Editor (DS/Gapbuffer) - Part 2](https://www.selfdotsend.com/blog/2018/08/11/writing-a-programmers-editor-(datastructure)---part-2/)
- [Lolcat in ARM assembly](https://www.selfdotsend.com/blog/2018/07/14/lolcat-in-arm-assembly/)

## Notes
- Primary content is published as HTML pages generated from Org-mode source.
- For canonical navigation, use the URLs listed above.
